text: The Diabolic Tenant () is a 1909 French silent movie directed by Georges MélièsPhilippe Rège. Encyclopedia of French Film Directors, Volume 1The Diabolic Tenant and stars Georges Méliès, André Méliès, and François Lallement. ==Actors== * Georges Méliès as the diabolic tenant * André Méliès as the family's young child * François Lallement as the young soldier in the family * Charles Claudel as the male janitor * Octavie Huvier as the female janitor ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:French movies Category:1909 movies Category:French silent movies
title: The Diabolic Tenant
